alert.note: Alert for Elkhart (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 17 at 12:04PM EST until February 19 at 1:00AM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR AN ICE JAM IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by an ice jam is expected. * WHERE...Near the intersection of County Road 36 and Indiana Ave in Goshen. * WHEN...Until 500 PM EST. * IMPACTS...River levels are rising with potential to reach nearby residential areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1201 PM EST, Emergency management reported an ice jam near the intersection of County Road 36 and Indiana Ave in Goshen. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Goshen. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
